1.text: Apply glitter primer or glue to your eyelids so the glitter stays on longer.

2.text: Hold a tissue or brush powder foundation under your eye to contain the mess.

3.text: Brush or pat the loose glitter eyeshadow onto your eyelids.

4.text: Play around with different glitter eyeshadow looks.

5.text: Wipe off fallen glitter with a tissue or large powder brush.

6.text: Brush glitter eyeshadow onto your eyebrows for a bright eye look.

7.text: Spread glitter eyeshadow on your skin to make your own body glitter.

8.text: Create glittery body shimmer to spritz over large areas of skin.

9.text: Rub product into your hair and add loose eyeshadow for shimmery hair.

10.text: Use loose glitter eyeshadow if you want to highlight your cheeks.

11.text: Press a piece of tape onto the glitter and pull it off.

12.text: Wipe a cotton pad with petroleum jelly over your skin.

13.text: Use makeup remover wipes only once you've lifted off the glitter.

14.text: Wash your eyelids or skin with an oil-based cleanser.
